name: Super Freddy world
description:
Super Freddy world - Arcade classic game with 100 levels filled with traps, enemies and coins to collect.
Discover the world of Super Freddy today, find the warp zones and hidden treasures,
take out enemies and smash blocks to find coins, extra lives and Power Flowers that gives you the power to take out enemies with flower shots!

This is trulu an amazing adventure game suitable for all ages.
Play through different landscapes, caves, underwater swim levels and super awesome castle boss fights!

Show the evil bosse that you have what it takes to save defeat the enemies and save the world and restore the peace
in this wonderful game of Super Freddy World!

NO ads what so ever, just play the game and enjoy tons of super arcade avdenture play.

Don´t forget to rate us!
